// GENERATED CODE - PLEASE DO NOT EDIT

    private static class ContextInvocation${methodCount}${genericTypes} extends com.gh.bmd.jrt.android.invocation.FunctionContextInvocation<Object, ${resultClassName}> {

        private final  com.gh.bmd.jrt.android.core.ContextInvocationTarget mInvocationTarget;

        private final String mShareGroup;

        private Object mMutex = this;

        private com.gh.bmd.jrt.core.InvocationTarget mTarget;

        private ContextInvocation${methodCount}(@javax.annotation.Nullable final String shareGroup,
                @javax.annotation.Nonnull final com.gh.bmd.jrt.android.core.ContextInvocationTarget target) {

            mShareGroup = shareGroup;
            mInvocationTarget = target;
        }

        @Override
        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
        public void onContext(@javax.annotation.Nonnull final android.content.Context context) {

            super.onContext(context);

            try {

                final com.gh.bmd.jrt.core.InvocationTarget invocationTarget = mInvocationTarget.getInvocationTarget(context);
                final Object target = invocationTarget.getTarget();
                final String shareGroup = mShareGroup;

                if (!com.gh.bmd.jrt.annotation.ShareGroup.NONE.equals(shareGroup)) {

                    mMutex = com.gh.bmd.jrt.core.RoutineBuilders.getSharedMutex(${mutexTarget}, shareGroup);
                }

                mTarget = invocationTarget;

            } catch (final Throwable t) {

                throw com.gh.bmd.jrt.invocation.InvocationException.wrapIfNeeded(t);
            }
        }
